dict.string: Check who is Streaming on twitch.tv and watch your favorite Stream via LiveStreamer on VLC.
List all the steamers who are online.
Search games which are live on twitch.tv.
Search streams who are online on twitch.tv.

keywords and description: ———————————————————————————————— twtop = top50 live streams on twitch.tv (sort by number of viewers) tw = searching for a specific stream (game or channel/streamer) optional: twgame = searching for a specific game which has streams
examples: ———————————————————————————————— twtop
tw warcraft (searches for streams of „world of warcraft“ or „warcraft3“ as well as streams of a streamer who is called like „warcraftBoy“)
optional: twgame world (lists a list of games like „world of warcraft“ - in future: you can select one of them like wow, that leeds you to „tw world of warcraft“ s.a.)
known bugs: ———————————————————————————————— - optional function „twgame“: twgame warcraft does not find „world of warcraft“, twgame w does - sorting a bit broken in „twtop“
